_description: Golden JD Test Set for Leadership Gating Validation
_purpose: Test deterministic leadership detection across all functions with zero Claude calls

test_cases.name: Director of Recruiting - No Leadership Experience
test_cases.description: Leadership role with zero leadership years should hard fail

jd.job_description:
About the job

Director of Recruiting

We are looking for a Director of Recruiting to build and lead our talent acquisition team.

Requirements:
- 7+ years of people leadership experience required
- Direct reports: will manage team of 10+ recruiters
- Must have built and scaled recruiting teams
- Executive search experience preferred

experience.title: Senior Technical Recruiter
experience.description: Full-cycle technical recruiting. Sourcing, screening, hiring for engineering teams.
